snippet: Jihad Allaham, the speaker of the Syrian People’s Assembly, wrote to Rep. John A. Boehner as Congress prepares to debate a military strike on Syria.
lead_paragraph: Jihad Allaham, the speaker of the Syrian People’s Assembly, wrote to Rep. John A. Boehner as Congress prepares to debate a military strike on Syria.

headline.seo: Letter From Syrian Lawmaker to Rep. John A. Boehner
